synsets.definition: Moral ambition to achieve success through virtuous means while maintaining dignity and ethical conduct; the drive for advancement that elevates both self and society
synsets.cultural_note: Confucian concept linking personal advancement with moral cultivation, emphasizing that true ambition must serve righteous purposes

synsets.definition: The ambitious drive to rise from humble beginnings through pure determination and hard work, earning respect through perseverance rather than privilege
synsets.cultural_note: Celebrates those who achieve success from the bottom up, embodying the Japanese value of earning one's position through dedication

synsets.definition: Intense ambition for achievement that encompasses both personal advancement and bringing honor to one's family lineage
synsets.cultural_note: Korean concept where individual ambition is inseparable from collective family pride and generational responsibility

synsets.definition: Dharmic ambition that seeks advancement through righteous effort and innovation while fulfilling one's cosmic duties
synsets.cultural_note: Sanskrit-derived concept linking personal ambition with dharmic obligations, where success must align with cosmic order

synsets.definition: Sharp, focused ambition that pierces through obstacles to achieve goals with the precision and power of Murugan's divine weapon
synsets.cultural_note: Tamil concept drawing from the war god Murugan's spear, representing concentrated ambition that overcomes all barriers

lemmas: ความมุ่งมั่น
synsets.definition: Gentle but persistent ambition that advances toward goals while maintaining harmony and consideration for others' well-being
synsets.cultural_note: Thai Buddhist approach to ambition that balances personal advancement with compassionate consideration for community harmony

synsets.definition: Revolutionary ambition to improve one's condition while contributing to collective progress and national development
synsets.cultural_note: Indonesian concept rooted in independence struggle, where personal ambition serves broader community and national advancement

synsets.definition: Noble ambition that seeks worldly advancement as a means to serve Allah and fulfill one's purpose in the cosmic order
synsets.cultural_note: Islamic concept where earthly ambition is sanctified when directed toward divine purpose and community benefit

synsets.definition: Chivalrous ambition that seeks advancement through generous deeds and noble conduct, elevating others while rising oneself
synsets.cultural_note: Persian ethical ideal where true ambition manifests through magnanimous acts that benefit society while achieving personal goals

synsets.definition: Spiritual ambition to elevate both material circumstances and moral character, ascending toward divine purpose
synsets.cultural_note: Jewish mystical concept linking worldly advancement with spiritual elevation, where ambition serves tikkun (repair) of self and world

synsets.definition: Grand ambition rooted in purpose that seeks to advance oneself while uplifting the entire community through Ubuntu principles
synsets.cultural_note: East African concept where individual ambition is meaningful only when it contributes to collective flourishing and community strength

synsets.definition: Divinely inspired ambition to achieve greatness that honors the ancestors and brings pride to one's lineage
synsets.cultural_note: Yoruba concept connecting personal ambition with ancestral honor and divine favor, where success validates spiritual worthiness

synsets.definition: Balanced ambition that seeks advancement while maintaining sacred relationships with all beings and honoring the sacred hoop
synsets.cultural_note: Lakota concept where personal advancement must harmonize with natural law and community well-being, reflecting interconnectedness

synsets.definition: Ambition grounded in reciprocity that seeks advancement through mutual aid and balanced exchange with community
synsets.cultural_note: Andean concept where individual progress occurs through reciprocal relationships, maintaining cosmic and social balance

synsets.definition: Fierce, passionate ambition that claws upward from adversity with emotional intensity and unrelenting determination
synsets.cultural_note: Brazilian concept celebrating emotional intensity in pursuit of goals, embracing struggle as part of the passionate climb toward success

synsets.definition: Sacred ambition to live with divine energy and purpose, achieving worldly success as expression of cosmic force within
synsets.cultural_note: Aztec/Mexican indigenous concept where personal ambition channels divine energy (teotl) into meaningful worldly achievement

synsets.definition: Honorable competitive ambition that seeks to excel while respecting opponents and maintaining community bonds
synsets.cultural_note: Ethiopian concept of noble competition where individual advancement occurs through respectful rivalry that strengthens community

synsets.definition: Enthusiastic ambition that pursues goals with infectious energy and communal spirit, inspiring others to rise together
synsets.cultural_note: Filipino concept of contagious enthusiasm where individual ambition energizes and elevates the entire community

synsets.definition: Ancestral ambition that seeks advancement to honor tupuna (ancestors) and strengthen iwi (tribal) mana for future generations
synsets.cultural_note: Māori concept linking personal achievement with ancestral honor and tribal strength, where success validates whakapapa (genealogy)

synsets.definition: Focused ambition that places one's will and determination toward achieving great purposes that benefit society
synsets.cultural_note: Chinese concept of purposeful ambition where individual will aligns with greater social good, reflecting Confucian ideals

synsets.definition: Creative ambition that initiates new ventures and opportunities while serving dharmic purposes and community development
synsets.cultural_note: Bengali concept celebrating innovative ambition that creates opportunities for both personal advancement and community benefit

synsets.definition: Elevated ambition that seeks noble goals worthy of one's ancestors and contributes to family honor and social harmony
synsets.cultural_note: Vietnamese Confucian concept emphasizing that true ambition must aim for worthy goals that honor lineage and serve society

synsets.definition: Honorable Islamic ambition that seeks worldly advancement through virtuous means to better serve Allah and community
synsets.cultural_note: Ottoman Turkish concept distinguishing between base ambition and noble striving that serves divine will and social good

synsets.definition: Dharmic enthusiasm and ambition that pursues advancement with joy and energy while fulfilling cosmic and social duties
synsets.cultural_note: Gujarati concept of spiritually-grounded ambition that maintains joy and righteousness while pursuing material and spiritual progress

synsets.definition: Buddhist-influenced ambition that seeks advancement through merit-making and mindful effort that benefits all sentient beings
synsets.cultural_note: Cambodian concept blending Theravada Buddhism with material aspiration, where personal advancement generates merit for all beings
